census2020download 2.3.0
  • Reference

Package index

Key Functions

census2020_get_data()
Download and clean up US States,DC,PR block data Census 2020 (for EJAM)
census2020_save_datasets()
Create separate data.tables, and optionally save them in the EJAM package This is just done when Census FIPS or bounds or points change.

Datasets

blockid2fips
Census FIPS code of each US Census 2020 block
blockpoints
lat/lon location of internal point of each Census 2020 block, used in EJAM package
blockwts
2020 Census block weights (population as share of overall block group)
lookup_states
basic information about US States from 2023
quaddata
xyz location of internal point of each Census 2020 block, for spatial index in EJAM
